entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,18003}It's been a string of surprises lately.{F801}First, we were suddenly told we were{F801}Samurai...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18004}{F87B,4,6,1,1}And then we're cast directly into{F801}battle with demons. I can scarcely{F801}catch my breath here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,18003}It's been a string of surprises lately.{F801}First, we were suddenly told we were{F801}Samurai...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18004}{F87B,4,6,1,1}And then we're cast directly into{F801}battle with demons. I can scarcely{F801}catch my breath here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,18005}I'm equally taken aback, I assure you.{F801}Demons? In our peaceful kingdom?{F801}I'd have scoffed at the notion...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18006}My father works at the Monastery,{F801}yet he never told me of such things.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,18005}I'm equally taken aback, I assure you.{F801}Demons? In our peaceful kingdom?{F801}I'd have scoffed at the notion...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18006}My father works at the Monastery,{F801}yet he never told me of such things.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,18007}Well, I'm glad to be chosen. I didn't{F801}want to carry on the family trade{F801}out in the countryside anyway.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18008}I don't mind doing battle with demons,{F801}if that's the job. It's good sport!{F801}I think this Samurai routine suits me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,18007}Well, I'm glad to be chosen. I didn't{F801}want to carry on the family trade{F801}out in the countryside anyway.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18008}I don't mind doing battle with demons,{F801}if that's the job. It's good sport!{F801}I think this Samurai routine suits me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,18009}I, too, feel honored to have been{F801}chosen as a Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18010}A Samurai's duty is to protect this{F801}kingdom and its people. It's a worthy{F801}endeavor.{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,18011}I hope to carry out my duties as a{F801}Samurai as long as I live, that this{F801}peace might last forever.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,18009}I, too, feel honored to have been{F801}chosen as a Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18010}A Samurai's duty is to protect this{F801}kingdom and its people. It's a worthy{F801}endeavor.{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,18011}I hope to carry out my duties as a{F801}Samurai as long as I live, that this{F801}peace might last forever.{F801}

entry.source: "It comes naturally to me."{F801}"It's a worthy duty."{F801}"I don't know."{F801}
entry.target: "It comes naturally to me."{F801}"It's a worthy duty."{F801}"I don't know."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,18013}Ah, so you think so too! We think{F801}alike, you and me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,18013}Ah, so you think so too! We think{F801}alike, you and me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,18014}Oh, so you share my view? I suspect we{F801}may become great friends, {F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,18014}Oh, so you share my view? I suspect we{F801}may become great friends, {F843,0}.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,18015}That's pretty pathetic. Can't you{F801}even form your own opinion?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,18015}That's pretty pathetic. Can't you{F801}even form your own opinion?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,18016}Ahahaha...! It seems even the Samurai{F801}who claimed first place can't best{F801}our Burroughs.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,18016}Ahahaha...! It seems even the Samurai{F801}who claimed first place can't best{F801}our Burroughs.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,18017}Anyway... this view's amazing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18018}It's as if the whole Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado is floating on the clouds.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,18017}Anyway... this view's amazing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,18018}It's as if the whole Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado is floating on the clouds.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}enjoyed the view, their spirits filled{F801}with hopes and expectations...{F801}{F802}〉 When they grew tired, the young Samurai{F801}elected to return to their rooms.{F801}{F802}〉 At midnight that night...{F801}
